info.name: Shortest Broken Spiral Thing
info.description: I had a spiral thing that looked glitchy for higher values. Then I tried to make it as short as I could

renderpass.code:
#define mainImage(o,p)	\
	vec2 uv = ( p - .5* iResolution.xy ) / iResolution.y;	\
    o = vec4(vec3(3.*uv, 0.5+.5*cos(iTime+length(uv)) )*sin(pow(10000.,abs( sin(.05*iTime) ) )*length(uv)+atan(uv.y,uv.x)+4.*iTime), 1.0)
renderpass.name: Image
